attributes.action: take part in a debate with the Leaders of the two Opposition Parties, in order to renew interest in UK politics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister has ruled out participating in a debate with the Leaders of the two Opposition Parties.  We urge Mr Brown to take part in such a debate, which has become established practice in some of the world's democracies - for example, in the USA and France.

In France, the recent Presidential Election - and, in part, the publicity around the debate between Mr Sarkozy and Ms Royal - led to an 85% turnout. This could only be dreamed of in the UK where apathy and disinterest in politics is at its highest.

We urge him to reconsider his position.
